ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pjfn.1 | |- H e. CH |
| 2 |  | pjidm.2 | |- A e. ~H |
| 3 |  | pjsub.3 | |- B e. ~H |
| 4 |  | #P_neg1cn | |- -u 1 e. CC |
| 5 | 4, 3 | #P_hvmulcli | |- ( -u 1 .h B ) e. ~H |
| 6 | 1, 2, 5 | #P_pjaddii | |- ( ( projh ` H ) ` ( A +h ( -u 1 .h B ) ) ) = ( ( ( projh ` H ) ` A ) +h ( ( projh ` H ) ` ( -u 1 .h B ) ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 3, 4 | #P_pjmulii | |- ( ( projh ` H ) ` ( -u 1 .h B ) ) = ( -u 1 .h ( ( projh ` H ) ` B ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_oveq2i | |- ( ( ( projh ` H ) ` A ) +h ( ( projh ` H ) ` ( -u 1 .h B ) ) ) = ( ( ( projh ` H ) ` A ) +h ( -u 1 .h ( ( projh ` H ) ` B ) ) ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_eqtri | |- ( ( projh ` H ) ` ( A +h ( -u 1 .h B ) ) ) = ( ( ( projh ` H ) ` A ) +h ( -u 1 .h ( ( projh ` H ) ` B ) ) ) |
| 10 | 2, 3 | #P_hvsubvali | |- ( A -h B ) = ( A +h ( -u 1 .h B ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_fveq2i | |- ( ( projh ` H ) ` ( A -h B ) ) = ( ( projh ` H ) ` ( A +h ( -u 1 .h B ) ) ) |
| 12 | 1, 2 | #P_pjhclii | |- ( ( projh ` H ) ` A ) e. ~H |
| 13 | 1, 3 | #P_pjhclii | |- ( ( projh ` H ) ` B ) e. ~H |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_hvsubvali | |- ( ( ( projh ` H ) ` A ) -h ( ( projh ` H ) ` B ) ) = ( ( ( projh ` H ) ` A ) +h ( -u 1 .h ( ( projh ` H ) ` B ) ) ) |
| 15 | 9, 11, 14 | #P_3eqtr4i | |- ( ( projh ` H ) ` ( A -h B ) ) = ( ( ( projh ` H ) ` A ) -h ( ( projh ` H ) ` B ) ) |
